channel.title: Sentry.io Subprocessors RSS
channel.description: RSS feed of Sentry subprocessors who process customer data.

item.title: Sentry Subprocessors as of September 9, 2022
item.description:
Third Party Subprocessors: Amazon Web Services, Inc. 
Processing Purpose: Cloud infrastructure services 
Address: 410 Terry Avenue North Seattle, WA 98109 United States

Third Party Subprocessors: Google LLC (Google Cloud Platform)
Processing Purpose: Cloud infrastructure services 
Address: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View, CA 94043 United States

Third Party Subprocessors: Twilio Inc. (SendGrid) 
Processing Purpose: Email delivery services 
Address: 101 Spear Street, First Floor San Francisco, CA 94105 United States

Affiliate: Functional Software GmbH
Processing Purpose: Provides parts of the Service and related technical support 
Address: Rothschildplatz 3 Top 3.02.AB 1020 Vienna Austria

Affiliate: Sentry Software Canada Inc. 
Processing Purpose: Provides parts of the Service and related technical support 
Address: 129 Spadina Ave, 7th Floor Toronto, ON M5V 2L3 Canada

Affiliate: Sentry Software Netherlands B.V.
Processing Purpose: Provides parts of the Service and related technical support 
Address: Schiphol Boulevard 359 WTC Schiphol Airport, D-Tower 11th floor 1118BJ Schiphol Netherlands
